info.title: Momentum Hub API
info.description: General API documentation for the Laravel backend.

get.summary: Get Layout Toggles for Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization

200.description: Returns toggle settings for a specific organization

get.summary: Get Company Options

200.description: Returns a list of company names

get.summary: Get Strategic Drivers for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to filter strategic drivers

200.description: Returns strategic drivers list for the specified organization

description.example: Focuses on productization, technology, and data integration to create repeatable, scalable solutions that deliver on the brand promise.

get.summary: Get One Page Strategic Plan - Foundations

200.description: Returns foundational elements of the One Page Strategic Plan

content.example: To be renowned as the premier coaching organization that transforms how companies achieve their optimal exits.

get.summary: Get 3-Year Outlook for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to filter the 3-year outlook

200.description: Returns 3-year revenue outlook for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Core Capabilities for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve core capabilities data

200.description: Returns core capabilities data for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Four Decisions data for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve Four Decisions data

200.description: Returns Four Decisions data for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Constraints Tracker data for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve Constraints Tracker data

200.description: Returns Constraints Tracker data for the specified organization

get.summary: Get CSRF Token

200.description: Returns the CSRF token

get.summary: Get Annual Priorities scoreboard data for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve Annual Priorities scoreboard

200.description: Returns average score and member scores for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Company Traction Cards data for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve traction card percentages

200.description: Returns quarterly traction card percentages for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Project Progress data for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve project progress

200.description: Returns number of completed and total projects for the specified organization

get.summary: Get Growth Command Center metrics for an Organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve growth metrics

200.description: Returns annual metric progress data for an organization

get.summary: Get revenue and COGS growth by year for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to retrieve revenue and COGS growth data

200.description: Returns year-wise revenue and COGS growth

get.summary: Get annual priorities for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch annual priorities for

200.description: List of annual priorities with completion status

description.example: Systematize Coaching Framework (now called Momentum OS).

get.summary: Get traction data for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch traction data for

200.description: Traction data grouped by quarters

get.summary: Get department-level annual priorities for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch department annual priorities for

200.description: List of department annual priorities with completion status

description.example: Department-level initiative to enhance coaching operations.

get.summary: Get department traction data grouped by quarters for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch traction data for

200.description: Traction data grouped by quarters

get.summary: Get who, what, and when tasks for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch who-what-when data for

200.description: List of who-what-when tasks with status and comments

get.summary: Get monthly session tracker data for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch monthly sessions for

200.description: Monthly sessions data with date, status, and details

get.summary: Retrieve quarterly session data for the specified organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch quarterly sessions for

200.description: Quarterly sessions data for the organization

get.summary: Retrieve monthly session data for a specific organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch monthly sessions for

200.description: Monthly session records with status, agenda, and recap

get.summary: Get project progress and next recommended tools for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization name to fetch project progress for

200.description: Project progress including completed items, total items, and tool recommendations

get.summary: Get coaching checklist panels for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization to retrieve coaching checklist panels for

200.description: List of coaching checklist panels

get.summary: Get current coaching alignment focus items for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve focus items for

200.description: Current coaching alignment focus items

get.summary: Get current business pulse categories, ratings, and notes for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve business pulse data for

200.description: Current business pulse data by category

get.summary: Get upcoming coaching alignment action items for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve upcoming action items for

200.description: Upcoming coaching alignment action items

get.summary: Get coaching goals for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve coaching goals for

200.description: List of coaching goals

get.summary: Get list of issues for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve issues for

200.description: List of issues related to the organization

get.summary: Get list of recorded victories (milestones) for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve victories for

200.description: List of victories related to the organization

milestones.example: Systematize Coaching Framework (now called Momentum OS).

get.summary: Get list of Big Ideas submitted for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve big ideas for

200.description: List of big ideas with their details

description.example: Systematize Coaching Framework (now called Momentum OS).

get.summary: Get product evaluation grid data for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve product evaluations for

200.description: List of product evaluations

description.example: Systematize Coaching Framework (now called Momentum OS).

parameters.name: X-CSRF-TOKEN
parameters.description: CSRF token (retrieved from /api/csrf-token)

200.description: Login successful

get.summary: Get document list for an organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve document list for

200.description: List of documents

get.summary: Get list of departments or teams for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve departments for

200.description: List of departments

get.summary: Get list of members for a given organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization name to retrieve member directory for

200.description: List of members

what.example: Systematize Coaching Framework (now called Momentum OS).

recap.example: Shared Q1 goals and budget updates
All targets met. Positive team performance.
